[DQC.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 496,149,000 reported in the network role https://www.palfinger.ag/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-210000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 513,184,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role https://www.palfinger.ag/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
